post.author: Admin
post.title: We Need Your Help at States!
post.description: Hello Band Families! We are in the final stretch of the band season!  One of our LARGEST events
post.content:
Hello Band Families!

We are in the final stretch of the band season!  One of our LARGEST events is the State Contest and we need almost 100 volunteers to make this event a success!

We still need OVER 50 VOLUNTEERS to run this event... We need help in almost EVERY area... This is a FUNDRAISER for our band!!! Consider donating a few hours of your time to help... you WILL be able to see your band member perform...

Follow this link to signup to help at STATES:
http://www.signupgenius.com/go/805054EAFA729A02-omea1

Thank you in advance for helping us make this event a success both for our band program and for all our visiting bands,

Amanda Kost
President, NRHS Band Boosters
